I couldn't afford Relizen so I tried this. I take it twice a day. I ran out once and didn't think much of it because I didn't think it was really working. I was wrong. Hot flashes got more frequent and intense. Maybe it's mental but as long as I get relief, I don't care!! ... I took the brand name ...
